name: Minecart
description:
'Minecart' is a procedurally generated on-rails shooter that straps you into the titular minecart with a rifle and tells you to shoot the target ducks without losing your balance or your lunch.

  • Mouse - look/aim
  • Left click - fire rifle
  • Right click/space - brakes

Made in 48 hours for BGSjam6, the sixth official game jam of Buffalo Game Space. The theme was "The Wild West", and this fits it mildly.

Credits:

  • Chris Langford - Programming and Design
  • Joshua Smith - 3D modeling, texturing, title and credit screen art
  • Phil Lowrey - Music
